title: Warning: specifying a "dotkit" module root has no effect
body:
Today I pulled the newest commits from the spack dev branch (since I was affected by [this](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/12962) bug and now executing setup-env.sh leads to this error:

```
$ $SPACK_ROOT/share/spack/setup-env.sh 

==> Warning: specifying a "dotkit" module root has no effect [support for dotkit module files has been dropped]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/apps/spack/bin/spack", line 64, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/apps/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 651, in main
    print_setup_info(*args.print_shell_vars.split(','))
  File "/apps/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 598, in print_setup_info
    module_to_roots[name].append(path)
KeyError: 'dotkit'

```
The warning is also shown when running just "spack list", here is the (relevant) output with the "-d --stacktrace" option:

```
$ spack -d --stacktrace list

lib/spack/spack/config.py:684 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.160306] Reading config file /apps/spack/etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:684 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.169278] Reading config file /apps/spack/etc/spack/defaults/linux/modules.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:684 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.172336] Reading config file /home/anselmam/.spack/modules.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:684 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.177407] Reading config file /apps/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:684 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.191328] Reading config file /home/anselmam/.spack/config.yaml
lib/spack/spack/schema/__init__.py:93 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.204053] Warning: specifying a "dotkit" module root has no effect [support for dotkit module files has been dropped]
lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py:101 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.206996] Imported list from built-in commands
lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py:101 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.207759] Imported list from built-in commands
lib/spack/spack/config.py:684 ==> [2019-10-04-08:09:48.218166] Reading config file /apps/spack/etc/spack/defaults/repos.yaml
```

Afterwards spack does not change my $MODULEPATH, so the modules created by spack are not available with "module av", if I don't adjust my $MODULEPATH manually.

### Information on your system
 1. Arch linux
 2. lmod for loading module files
